about_the_game:
Insect Wars is a real-time strategy game that immerses you in the thrilling world of ant warfare. As the leader of your ant colony, you must gather resources, build your colony, and lead your ant army to victory over your enemies. Whether you play 1v1 or team up with friends to face the AI, every game of Insect Wars is a unique experience that requires strategic thinking, resource management, and tactical skill.

Gameplay:

At the start of each game, you will take control of a colony of ants, each with unique abilities and strengths. Your goal is to gather resources, such as food and building materials, and use them to expand your colony and strengthen your army.

You must manage your resources carefully, as your ants require food to survive and building materials to construct new structures. As you gather more resources, you can construct buildings that give you access to new units and technologies, allowing you to create a more powerful and diverse army.

To win a game of Insect Wars, you must destroy the enemy's queen ant, which is the heart of their colony. To do this, you will need to scout your enemy's territory, gather intelligence on their defenses, and launch devastating attacks on their army and structures.

As you progress through the game, you will encounter new challenges and obstacles, such as hostile insects and environmental hazards. You must adapt your strategy to overcome these challenges and emerge victorious.

Features:

Real-time strategy gameplay that requires strategic thinking and tactical skill
Unique ant colonies with different abilities and strengths
Resource management and base-building mechanics
Diverse unit types and technologies to unlock and master
Scouting and intelligence-gathering mechanics for strategic planning
PVP and team-up modes for endless replayability
Challenging AI opponents for solo play
Environmental hazards and hostile insects for added challenge
Insect Wars is the ultimate strategy game for fans of RTS and insect enthusiasts alike. With its deep gameplay, endless replayability, and immersive world-building, it is sure to keep you hooked for hours on end.

name: Insect Wars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 14-4440 3.10Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 14-4440 3.10Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Insect Wars is a real-time strategy game where you lead an army of insects. Collect resources, build your colony, and destroy the enemy's to win. Scout the enemy, master different unit types and technologies, and face off in 1v1 or team-up against the AI.
